Package menuClasses

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Any object of this type must have a method that executes necessary algorithm to carry-out the action it represents.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCoAction
    Action in charge of adding a Company to the system
    AddSHAction
    Action in charge of executing the addition of a ShareHolder to the system.
    AddSharesCo
    Action in charge of adding aditional shares to a copmany
    AddSharesToSH
    ACtion in charge of adding shares to a ShareHOlder
    AdminBuySellAction
    Executes Buy/Sell Menu
    AdminBuySellMenu
    Buy/Sell Menu
    AdminCoAction
    Executes the Admin companies menu
    AdminCoMenu
    Copmany operation and administration menu
    AdminSHAction
    Executes the ShareHolder administration menu
    AdminSHMenu
    ShareHolder operations menu
    AdminStockAction
    Executes Stock administration menu
    AdminStockMenu
    Stock administration menu
    ExitAction
    Implements the exit action and how it saves the current data on the system for future use
    MainMenu
    Main menu
    Menu
    In charge of executing the menus
    Option
    Defines the types of options that a menu contains.
    RemoveCoAction
    Executes the remove company action
    RemoveSHAction
    Executes a ShareHolder removal
    SellSharesFromSH
    Executes the sell shares from a ShareHolder action
    ShowCoReportAction
    Shows the menu to present a company report
    ShowSHReportAction
    Shows the menu to present a ShareHolder report
    ShowSReportAction
    Shows the menu to present a ShareHolder report
    SplitCoShAction
    Split shares action
    UpShareValAction
    Updates the value of a company share
